site_title: Meret — Qonnaan Bultoota fi Gabaa Wal-qunnamsiisu
hero_desc: Qonnaan bultoota baadiyyaa jajjabeessu, waraqaa fi gurgurtaa gabaa magaalaa waliin wal-qunnamsiisu.
about_desc: Meret rakkoo qonnaan bultoota Itoophiyaa keessa jiran furuuf ijaarrame, gabaa irratti wal-qunnamsiisuun bu'aa hin malle hir'isa.

cards.title: Odeeffannoo Gabaa
cards.desc: Qonnaan bultoonni odeeffannoo gatii fi haala gabaa yeroo ammaa argachuu danda'u.

cards.title: Deggersa Geejjibaa
cards.desc: Irree gabaa magaalaa fi qonnaan bultoota baadiyyaa jidduutti geejjiba sirrii ni kennina.

cards.title: Gatii Badaa Hir’isu
cards.desc: Sistemii keenya kuusaa fi dhiyeessa yeroo sirrii too’achuudhaan gatii badaa hir’isa.

cards.title: Qonnaan Bultoota Walitti Qindeessu
cards.desc: Garee walitti qindeessuun humna gurgurtaa ol-kaasa.

cards.title: Gatii Sirrii
cards.desc: Qonnaan bultoota fi gurgurtoonni gatii sirrii fi ifa argachuu danda’u.

cards.title: Xiinxala fi Hubannoo
cards.desc: Ogeessonni fi bulchiistoonni gabaa fi adeemsa midhaanii hordofuu danda’u.
